channel.title: NOAA/ESRL Trends in CO2
channel.description: Recent Atmospheric CO2 Values from the NOAA Earth System Research Laboratory

item.title: Monthly CO2 Update for May, 2014
item.description: Recent Mauna Loa CO2 May 2014: 401.14 ppm. Recent global CO2 May 2014: 398.83 ppm

item.title: Monthly CO2 Update for April, 2014
item.description: Recent Mauna Loa CO2 April 2014: 401.85 ppm. Recent global CO2 April 2014: 398.87 ppm

item.title: Weekly CO2 Update for July 20, 2014
